de.esoco.process.ui.component

Class UiDataTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.process.param.ParameterWrapper<T,C>
        • de.esoco.process.ui.UiComponent<T,C>
          • de.esoco.process.ui.UiControl<T,C>
            • de.esoco.process.ui.UiTableControl<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>
              • de.esoco.process.ui.component.UiDataTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiHasActionEvents<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>, UiHasFocusEvents<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>, UiHasUpdateEvents<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class UiDataTable
extends UiTableControl<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>
implements UiHasUpdateEvents<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>, UiHasActionEvents<SelectionDataElement,UiDataTable>
    A table that displays a static collection of HierarchicalDataObject that is stored in the validator of a SelectionDataElement.

      • onSelection

        public final UiDataTable onSelection(java.util.function.Consumer<HierarchicalDataObject> rEventHandler)
        Sets the event handler for selection events of this table. The handler will receive the currently selected data object or NULL if no object is selected.
        Parameters:
        rEventHandler - The event handler
        Returns:
        This instance for concatenation

      • onSelectionConfirmed

        public final UiDataTable onSelectionConfirmed(java.util.function.Consumer<HierarchicalDataObject> rEventHandler)
        Sets the event handler for selection confirmed events (e.g. by double click) of this table. The handler will receive the currently selected data object or NULL if no object is selected.
        Parameters:
        rEventHandler - The event handler
        Returns:
        This instance for concatenation
